synthesis_conditions.drying_method: heating at 200 °C for 12 h under vacuum
synthesis_conditions.activation_method: outgassed to a constant weight at 200 ºC under a high vacuum (< 10-6 mbar)

synthesis_conditions.description: NENU-11 activated under vacuum (~10−6 mbar) at 200 °C for 12 h after refluxing in a saturated solution of NH4Cl for 72 h.

N2_adsorption.equipment: Micromeritics ASAP 2020 surface area and porosity analyzer

conditions.sample_amount: 100 mg of NENU-11a with adsorbed DMMP

hydrolysis_of_DMMP.recycling: After 8 h, the solid was filtered, washed with water, and then regenerated under vacuum at 200 °C for 12 h.
